Package game.enemies

Interface AoECapable

All Known Implementing Classes:
GiantCrab, GiantCrayfish, GiantDog, GiantEnemy, GodrickTheGrafted, HeavySkeletalSwordsman, SkeletalEnemy, SkeletonBandit
public interface AoECapable
An interface that defines an object that is able to perform aoe attacks and actions
Author:
Brandon Yong Hoong Tak 32025963 Modified by:
See Also:
  • AreaAttack
  • Created by:

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Weapon
    getAoEWeapon()
    Anything that is aoe capable should be able to supply the weapon that is used to perform the area attack this could be a weapon item that the holder has in its inventory or a weapon that is intrinsic to the holder itself such as a claw or head

  • Method Details

    • getAoEWeapon

      Weapon getAoEWeapon()
      Anything that is aoe capable should be able to supply the weapon that is used to perform the area attack this could be a weapon item that the holder has in its inventory or a weapon that is intrinsic to the holder itself such as a claw or head
      Returns:
      the weapon used in its area attack action
